analysis: The documents outline the order of succession for various cabinet positions in the event of absence, disability, resignation, or death of the primary office holders. They specify who is authorized to perform the duties of the Secretary in different departments (Commerce, Treasury, Interior, Navy, Office of Management and Budget, State, Agriculture, Labor). The orders often revoke previous executive orders on the same topic and establish a clear line of succession to maintain continuity of operations.
title: Cabinet Department Succession Protocols
